statements: UPDATE BiopharmaceuticalProducts SET storage_temperature = 2.5, expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE product_id = 1

UPDATE Distribution SET quantity = 50, storage_conditions = 'Dry' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Storage SET temperature = 20.5, last_updated = now() WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Distribution SET quantity = 100, storage_conditions = 'Dry' WHERE product_name = 'Rice' AND location = 'Warehouse A';
UPDATE Storage SET temperature = 10.5, humidity = 60.3, last_updated = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE location = 'Cold Storage';
UPDATE biopharmaceutical_products SET storage_condition = 'Refrigerated' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE distribution_centers SET temperature_controlled = TRUE, location = 'California' WHERE center_id = 2;
UPDATE biopharmaceutical_products SET storage_condition = 'Cool and dry' WHERE product_id = 123;
